survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Virtual Fitness Classes Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users who have participated in virtual fitness classes to understand their satisfaction levels, preferences, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you participate in virtual fitness classes?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options cover all frequency ranges.

script.question_text: How often do you participate in virtual fitness classes?

questions.question_text: Which types of virtual fitness classes have you attended? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use multi-choice checkboxes. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which types of virtual fitness classes have you attended? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a virtual fitness class? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Limit selections to 3 to prioritize key factors. Use checkboxes with validation.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes) with max selection limit of 3.

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a virtual fitness class? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the overall quality of virtual fitness classes you have attended?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction. Ensure the scale is clearly labeled.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE (radio buttons) with a 5-point scale.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the overall quality of virtual fitness classes you have attended?

questions.question_text: What do you like most about virtual fitness classes?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What do you like most about virtual fitness classes?

questions.question_text: What challenges have you faced while participating in virtual fitness classes?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to identify pain points. Encourage honesty.

script.question_text: What challenges have you faced while participating in virtual fitness classes?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend virtual fitness classes to a friend or colleague?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure Net Promoter Score (NPS).
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE (radio buttons) with a 5-point scale.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend virtual fitness classes to a friend or colleague?

questions.question_text: Which devices do you typically use to attend virtual fitness classes? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to understand device preferences. Include an 'Other' option.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which devices do you typically use to attend virtual fitness classes? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How important is live interaction with the instructor during virtual fitness classes?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to gauge the importance of live interaction.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE (radio buttons) with a 5-point scale.

script.question_text: How important is live interaction with the instructor during virtual fitness classes?

questions.question_text: What additional features would you like to see in virtual fitness classes?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather suggestions for improvement.

script.question_text: What additional features would you like to see in virtual fitness classes?
